Recommendation.description: Represents a recommendation result generated by the recommendation engine.

creationTime.description: Timestamp when this instance was created.

recommendationId.description: A GUID value that each recommendation object is associated with.

resourceId.description: Full ARM resource ID string that this recommendation object is associated with.

resourceScope.description: Name of a resource type this recommendation applies, e.g. Subscription, ServerFarm, Site.

displayName.description: UI friendly name of the rule (may not be unique).

level.description: Level indicating how critical this recommendation can impact.

channels.description: List of channels that this recommendation can apply.

tags.description: The list of category tags that this recommendation belongs to.

actionName.description: Name of action recommended by this object.

startTime.description: The beginning time in UTC of a range that the recommendation refers to.

endTime.description: The end time in UTC of a range that the recommendation refers to.

nextNotificationTime.description: When to notify this recommendation next in UTC. Null means that this will never be notified anymore.

notificationExpirationTime.description: Date and time in UTC when this notification expires.

notifiedTime.description: Last timestamp in UTC this instance was actually notified. Null means that this recommendation hasn't been notified yet.

score.description: A metric value measured by the rule.

isDynamic.description: True if this is associated with a dynamically added rule

extensionName.description: Extension name of the portal if exists.

bladeName.description: Deep link to a blade on the portal.

forwardLink.description: Forward link to an external document associated with the rule.

RecommendationRule.description: Represents a recommendation rule that the recommendation engine can perform.

displayName.description: UI friendly name of the rule.

message.description: Localized name of the rule (Good for UI).

recommendationId.description:
Recommendation ID of an associated recommendation object tied to the rule, if exists.
If such an object doesn't exist, it is set to null.

description.description: Localized detailed description of the rule.

actionName.description: Name of action that is recommended by this rule in string.

level.description: Level of impact indicating how critical this rule is.

channels.description: List of available channels that this rule applies.

tags.description: An array of category tags that the rule contains.

isDynamic.description: True if this is associated with a dynamically added rule

extensionName.description: Extension name of the portal if exists. Applicable to dynamic rule only.

bladeName.description: Deep link to a blade on the portal. Applicable to dynamic rule only.

forwardLink.description: Forward link to an external document associated with the rule. Applicable to dynamic rule only.

subscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionIdParameter.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

resourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

x-internal-split-members.displayName: Get Rule Details By Web App
List Recommended Rules For Web App
Reset All Filters For Web App
